items.sentence: Why don\'t you do something useful and get me some coffee?
You can come and see me whenever it\'s convenient for you.
You have wanted to go there for a long time, haven\'t you?
I haven\'t told the kids yet that we\'re getting divorced.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom and Mary don\'t know each other.
I\'m the only one in this group who doesn\'t speak French.
Tom said he wanted me to be at the meeting this afternoon.
Tom takes a shower every morning before he goes to school.
Tom never expected that Mary would fall in love with John.
Tom never forgave himself for hurting Mary the way he did.
